Translations.Text: Amedya n snat n trebbuyaa am uder$al, uaeeug, akked win ipwalin, win isellen. Day aadlen sin imedyaten agi? Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "nek d aneddao nnwen ipbegginen
iwakken ur taabdem siwa Oebbi. Nek ugaded aaaqeb fellawen, ass aqeohan
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, seg ugdud is: "kecc, $uone$, d amdan am nekwni. Nwala, d oodiyen nne$, kan, war ameyyez, i k ivefoen. Ur nwala s wacu i $ tifem. Xaii, neesb ikwen d ikeddaben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Idreg fellawen. Day a t neeppem fellawen, ma kunwi tugim t
A yagdud iw! Ur awen ssuture$ ayla, ilmend is; taqdiat iw ar Oebbi kan. Ur ppara$, nek, wid iumnen. S tidep, ad mlilen d Mass nnsen. Maca, nek wala$ kwen d agdud ur nessin
A yagdud iw! Acu ara yi isellken seg ufus n Oebbi, lemmer i ten rri$ akin, day ur d tesmektayem ara

Ur awen qqaoe$: $uoi lexzayen n Oebbi. Ur ssine$ tabavnit. Ur qqaoe$: nek d lmelk. Ur qqaoe$ i wid eeqoent wallen nnwen: ur asen Ippak ara Oebbi lxio, d awez$i. Yif akw Oebbi akken Ieoa, i illan deg iman nnsen. Mulac ad ili$ seg imednas
Nnan: "a Nue! Ni$ tnamrev a$, tessugtev a$ anamer. Ihi, awi ya$ d ayen i $ taahdev, ma tessawalev tidep
Inna: "d Oebbi kan ar awen t id Iawin, ma ihwa yaS. Kunwi ur tesfunnugem
Xas b$i$ a kwen neuee$, ur tesfaydayam seg wanuae iw, ma Ib$a Oebbi a kwen Itlef. Neppa d Mass nnwen; tu$alin nnwen $uoeS
Ne$ qqaoen: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "ma snulfa$ t id, lbe$wv iw i yiri w. Nek, ur ppka$ di lbe$wv nnwen
Ippuweeea d i Nue: "ur ippamen yiwen, d awez$i, seg ugdud ik, siwa wid illan umnen. Ihi, ur k icqi wayen xeddmen
Eunaa lbabuo, ger wallen nne£, s uweeei nne£. Ur iyI d pmeslay $ef wid idensen, war ccekk, ad $emqen
La iuennaa lbabuo. Yal tikelt ara aaddin $uoes imvebboen n ugdud is, tkaariren fellas. Inna: "ma temmaalkem degne$, ihi, a nemmaalek degwen akken temmaalkem
Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, ara ieaz uaaqeb imezgi
Alamma, mi d iusa lameo nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran d ihedman, Nenna: "awi degs tayuga n yal uuenf, tawacult ik - siwa wid i$ef id izwar wawal -, akked wid iumnen". Drus kan i iumnen yides
